properties.info: The project  will develop or improve small-scale irrigation systems in 12 districts in Nepal through a community-driven process targeted at the poor, women, and other disadvantaged groups
sectors: Agriculture, natural resources and rural development
properties.title: COMMUNITY IRRIGATION PROJECT
